}\tabularnewline

\multicolumn{2}{|c|}{Lie group $\mathcal{M},\circ$} & size & dim & $\mathcal{X}\in\mathcal{M}$ & Constraint & $\boldsymbol{\tau}^{\wedge}\in\frak{m}$ & $\boldsymbol{\tau}\in\mathbb{R}^{m}$ & $\mathrm{Exp}\left(\boldsymbol{\tau}\right)$ & Comp. & Action\tabularnewline
\hline 
$n$-D vector & $\mathbb{R}^{n},+$ & $n$ & $n$ & $\mathbf{v}\in\mathbb{R}^{n}$ & $\mathbf{v}-\mathbf{v}=\mathbf{0}$ & $\mathbf{v}\in\mathbb{R}^{n}$ & $\mathbf{v}\in\mathbb{R}^{n}$ & $\mathbf{v}=\exp\left(\mathbf{v}\right)$ & $\mathbf{v}_{1}+\mathbf{v}_{2}$ & $\mathbf{v}+\mathbf{x}$\tabularnewline
\hline 
circle & $S^{1},\cdot$ & $2$ & $1$ & $\mathbf{z}\in\mathbb{C}$ & $\mathbf{z}*\mathbf{z}=1$ & $i\theta\in i\mathbb{R}$ & $\theta\in\mathbb{R}$ & $\mathbf{z}=\exp\left(i\theta\right)$ & $\mathbf{z}_{1}\,\mathbf{z}_{2}$ & $\mathbf{z}\,\mathbf{x}$\tabularnewline
Rotation & $SO(2),\cdot$ & $4$ & $1$ & $\mathbf{R}$ & $\mathbf{R}^{\top}\mathbf{R}=\mathbf{I}$ & $\left[\theta\right]_{\times}\in\mathfrak{so}(2)$ & $\theta\in\mathbb{R}$ & $\mathbf{R}=\exp\left(\left[\theta\right]_{\times}\right)$ & $\mathbf{R}_{1}\,\mathbf{R}_{2}$ & $\mathbf{R}\,\mathbf{x}$\tabularnewline
Rigid motion & $SE(2),\cdot$ & $9$ & $3$ & $\mathbf{M}=\left[\begin{array}{cc}
\mathbf{R} & \mathbf{t}\\
0 & 1
\end{array}\right]$ & $\mathbf{R}^{\top}\mathbf{R}=\mathbf{I}$ & $\left[\begin{array}{cc}
\left[\theta\right]_{\times} & \boldsymbol{\rho}\\
0 & 0
\end{array}\right]\in\mathfrak{se}(2)$ & $\left[\begin{array}{c}
\boldsymbol{\rho}\\
\theta
\end{array}\right]\in\mathbb{R}^{3}$ & $\exp\left(\left[\begin{array}{cc}
\left[\theta\right]_{\times} & \boldsymbol{\rho}\\
0 & 0
\end{array}\right]\right)$ & $\mathbf{M}_{1}\,\mathbf{M}_{2}$ & $\mathbf{R}\,\mathbf{x}+\mathbf{t}$\tabularnewline
\hline 
$3$-sphere & $S^{3},\cdot$ & $4$ & $3$ & $\mathbf{q}\in\mathbb{H}$ & $\mathbf{q}^{*}\mathbf{q}=1$ & $\boldsymbol{\theta}/2\in\mathbb{H}_{p}$ & $\boldsymbol{\theta}\in\mathbb{R}^{3}$ & $\mathbf{q}=\exp\left(\mathbf{u}\theta/2\right)$ & $\mathbf{q}_{1}\,\mathbf{q}_{2}$ & $\mathbf{q}\,\mathbf{x}\,\mathbf{q}^{*}$\tabularnewline
Rotation & $SO(3),\cdot$ & $9$ & $3$ & $\mathbf{R}$ & $\mathbf{R}^{\top}\mathbf{R}=\mathbf{I}$ & $\left[\boldsymbol{\theta}\right]_{\times}\in\mathfrak{so}(3)$ & $\boldsymbol{\theta}\in\mathbb{R}^{3}$ & $\mathbf{R}=\exp\left(\left[\boldsymbol{\theta}\right]_{\times}\right)$ & $\mathbf{R}_{1}\,\mathbf{R}_{2}$ & $\mathbf{R}\,\mathbf{x}$\tabularnewline
Rigid motion & $SE(3),\cdot$ & $16$ & $6$ & $\mathbf{M}=\left[\begin{array}{cc}
\mathbf{R} & \mathbf{t}\\
0 & 1
\end{array}\right]$ & $\mathbf{R}^{\top}\mathbf{R}=\mathbf{I}$ & $\left[\begin{array}{cc}
\left[\boldsymbol{\theta}\right]_{\times} & \boldsymbol{\rho}\\
0 & 0
\end{array}\right]\in\mathfrak{se}(3)$ & $\left[\begin{array}{c}
\boldsymbol{\rho}\\
\boldsymbol{\theta}
\end{array}\right]\in\mathbb{R}^{6}$ & $\exp\left(\left[\begin{array}{cc}
\left[\boldsymbol{\theta}\right]_{\times} & \boldsymbol{\rho}\\
0 & 0
\end{array}\right]\right)$ & $\mathbf{M}_{1}\,\mathbf{M}_{2}$ & $\mathbf{R}\,\mathbf{x}+\mathbf{t}$\tabularnewline
\hline
